body.description: Specification Dustpan made of stainless steel; Brush is made of palm tree fiber. The perfect metal dust pan and brush set for indoor small area use, not suitable for outdoor. Dustpan size is 7*5.5*4.5 inch; Brush is made from palm tree fiber, size. 9.5*3.5 inch. Please be careful the shape edge of tiny dustpan when children use it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini Dustpan & Brush Oakart is dedicated to providing natural, innovative and pratical green houseware products that make everyday living easier.

Dustpan size is 7*5.5*4.5 inch; Brush is made from palm tree fiber, size. 9.5*3.5 inch. Please be careful the shape edge of tiny dustpan when children use it. Features: Mini Size Dustpan Handmade Mini Broom Traditional Janpanese Shuro Brush Brush Bristles Not Absorb Water Better for Indoor Used

Long Lasting Stainless Steel Dustpan Dustpan made of stainless steel perfect for sweeping small areas, kitchen and table. Tinny scoop size 5.5*4.5 inch for quick cleaning. Good Grips Natural Bamboo Handle Small bamboo handles for better grips. Including a palm strap, simply hang on a hook on wall or in a drawer. Shuro Brush Tied Up by Brass Line Traditional Janpanese shuro brush is handmade and dense bristle is manual tied up by brass line that can be used for years.

Compact Mini Size Dust Pan Mini dustpan in perfect size for easy storage, simply hang on wall or keep in drawer. Perfect Size for Daily Cleaning Shuro brush' s fine, flexible fibres are tough and highly durable yet soft and elastic. Great for cleaning dirt after planting or woodstove. Quick Cleaning for Coffee Table Tinny dust pan sweep set great for tabletop or kitchen countertop. Lovely decoration in your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little set
reviews.reviewText: This was just what I was looking for - it’s small , sturdy, love the thick bristles -works great - not plastic junk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use inside my Ventis fireplace insert. Great tool for cleaning an insert or wood stove.
reviews.reviewText: We recently purchased a Ventis HEI240 fireplace insert and we love it. But my open fireplace tools are just too big to do a good cleanout. So I ordered this dustpan and brush to work inside the insert. It's working out better than I had expected, the dustpan fits in there nicely and it's easy to scoop up piles of ash. Once I get the bulk of ashes scooped out I can use the brush to move the remaining ash to the center and scoop it out. I'm getting about 95% of all the ash out by using this dustpan and brush. I then use my shop vac with a filter bag installed to vacuum out the remaining ash. With the filter bag in my shop vac I get absolutely no ash dust into the room. It all works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and retro.
reviews.reviewText: These are a bit small, but I'm using it for a wood burning stove fireplace insert and the opening is small anyway. So far they've actually worked very well for me, and they are very cute and old fashioned looking which I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Petite Shuro Style Whisk Broom Set
reviews.reviewText: As others have said, it is quite small, but built of sturdy materials and well constructed. I would imagine if not abused it could easily last a lifetime. I agree with the review that said it was not stainless steel but rather it is nicely coated mild steel. I believe it will be absolutely perfect as a counterbrush to clean the stray flower and seeds and crumbs from the food contact surfaces in the kitchen and from the table linens on the dining table. I'm going to use it for just that so that it stays sanitary. Although, technically it would have to be made in Japan to be a Shuro broom and this one is clearly marked made in China, it is absolutely a quality product. The very same big palms and windmill palms that have been used for centuries are native to both China and Japan. I'm sure the broom bristles are authentic; they are very fine and don't create any static electricity so it's extremely well suited for sweeping and collecting extremely fine dust like pastry flour. I couldn't be happier with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's fine, except ...
reviews.reviewText: The little broom is cute, and functional. The little dustpan is - well - not quite as described. I mean, it is, except that the hanging loop pulled out of whatever was holding the ends to make that loop. I spent 5 minutes wrapping a rubber band around ... and around ... and around ... So far, it's holding. But this was purchased to be used, not as a decorative item, and I hang a lot of things because I have limited space. I guess it was too heavy for the glue, or whatever. Oh, yeah. One of the main reasons I chose THIS broom and dustpan was the lack of icky plastic parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My long handled tools don't fit under the log starter gas pipe so ash clean out isn't easy. This broom and pan are perfect size for a complete clean out. The pan is about same size as the long handled but the stubby handles make all the difference. Quality seems decent for the price, very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful and cute!
reviews.reviewText: This set is perfect for cleaning up around the wood stove. The metal dustpan is safe for hot coals and ash, and it's small enough to fit in the corners when cleaning out the firebox. I never thought of a dustpan and whisk broom as being cute, but these absolutely are. Also, the dustpan looks white inside, but it's all silver (all metal) as it should be. And the little broom is well made and holding up nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Non-Plastic Choice
reviews.reviewText: I'm trying to go as plastic-free as I can. This is a great little brush and dustpan set made of natural materials. I keep it on my back porch to take care of spills as they happen. The brush is thick and firm and the pan is just the right size. Both are well made. As my other dustpan sets wear out, I will replace them with more of these.
I used this wisk and dustpan to sweep up ash that falls on the hearth in front of the fireplace. Attractive and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my Mum as she really wanted one for when she's baking.It's surprisingly well made for such a low price. Very sturdy, yet lightweight and it LOOKS wonderful. You can display it proudly.I'm going to buy another one for myself to keep my coffee station tidy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good things come in small packages.
reviews.reviewText: This is small and exactly what I was looking for. Very sturdy. Quite rustic and attractive next to our fireplace. Perfect for keeping the stray dirt cleaned up around the front of the fire area. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect but probably smaller than it looks in the photo.
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened the parcel, I was disappointed with the size as it was smaller than I imagined. However having used it, it was much better than expected and really perfectly sized. I have also found it good for scrapping off drops of wax which splash onto the laminate floor.Much better than the plastic dustpan and brushes.
Only gave 4 stars because it certainly isn’t that big. However, it’s still a good working unit that goes with the decor of our firewood stove implements.
